description.en: Based on written, audio and video material (e.g. podcasts, interviews, documentaries, news), students are provided with rich input and a wide range of different exercises to improve their reading, listening, speaking and writing skills and to gain knowledge of different grammatical aspects as well as different language registers (e.g. academic and everyday language & dialects). Teaching methods are based on cooperative, autonomous and active learning and use multilingual approaches. In terms of content, the course covers both daily and academic topics.
description.et: Lugemis- ja kuulamistekstide ning mitmekesiste harjutuste abil luuakse (või täiendatakse) keeleoskust (rääkimine, lugemine, kuulamine, kirjutamine), omandatakse grammatilised põhialused ja püütakse saavutada vähemalt argipäeva keeleoskuse ning sõnaraamatuga lugemise tase. Käsitletakse nii igapäevaelu kui ka akadeemilisi teemasid.

objectives.en: A main objective of this course  is the improvement and expansion of means of expression in speaking and writing. A second focus is on the training of skills needed to understand written and audio texts with subject-specific content. Moreover the student will practice to speak freely in order to express opinions or co-operate with other course participants. The target level of the course corresponds to the level B2 of the CER.
objectives.et: Ainekursuse eesmärgiks on üliõpilaste lugemisvilumuse ja keeleoskuse arendamine. Harjutatakse retseptiivseid oskusi (lugemine, kuulamine), et suuta mõista erialaspetsiifilisi lugemis- ja kuulamistekste. Üliõpilased õpivad vabalt väljendama oma arvamusi ja mõtteid ning koopereeruma teiste õppijatega. Kursuse keeletase vastab B2 tasemele.

learning_outcomes.en:
Learning outcomes:
After the course, students will

- be aware of the cultural standards at German universities 
- be able to communicate in the academic environment of a German university (e.g. acquire skills in writing official emails, communicating with lecturers)
- Acquire skills in academic presentations in PowerPoint
- Develop skills in writing a good CV and motivation letter (e.g. for scholarship applications in Germany)
- be able to understand (through reading or listening) the main ideas of complex academic/technical texts. 
- The student will also have the ability to express his/her own opinion in detail, to reflect his/her views on actual topics from German-speaking countries and to present different arguments on a wide range of issues and topics. The student will be able to take part in conversations and make him/herself understood.
- The student will be able to work effectively in a team.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilased omandavad kuulamis- ja lugemisoskuse, mis aitab mõista keerulisemaid erialaspetsiifilisi tekste. Nad suudavad väljendada oma arvamusi ja mõtteid erinevate teemade ja probleemide kohta ning osaleda aktiivselt aruteludes.
